@graph.description: Complete property cleanout and handyman services including debris removal, repairs, renovations, painting, plumbing, electrical work, and property preparation throughout Buffalo and Western New York.

mainEntity.name: How much can I save by using one contractor for cleanout and handyman services?

acceptedAnswer.text: Property owners typically save 20-35% by using our integrated services compared to hiring separate contractors. You save on coordination time, avoid duplicate fees, and benefit from volume pricing. Our streamlined approach also reduces overall project timeline.

mainEntity.name: What types of properties do you handle?

acceptedAnswer.text: We work with all property types throughout Buffalo and Western New York: residential homes, commercial properties, investment properties, and specialized properties. Our team has experience from small apartments to large commercial buildings.

mainEntity.name: How quickly can you complete a cleanout and renovation project?

acceptedAnswer.text: A typical rental property turnover takes 5-7 days. A moderate renovation with cleanout, kitchen and bathroom updates, and painting takes 3-4 weeks. We can often begin work within 24-48 hours and bring additional crew for urgent situations.

mainEntity.name: Are you licensed and insured for all the services you provide?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Aaron Michael Services is fully licensed and insured for all property cleanout, handyman, and renovation services. We carry comprehensive liability insurance, workers' compensation, and appropriate contractor licenses for specialized work.

mainEntity.name: Can you help with property code violations or failed inspections?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely. We frequently work with property owners on code violations in Buffalo and Western New York. We're familiar with local codes and can quickly remediate violations, providing documentation for code enforcement offices.
